com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.dialogcomponents.suggester

Class RcsbUrlSuggester

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.dialogcomponents.suggester.UrlTemplateSuggester
      • com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.dialogcomponents.suggester.RcsbUrlSuggester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Suggester, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>>

    public class RcsbUrlSuggester
extends UrlTemplateSuggester
    A UrlTemplateSuggester which handled the RCSB suggestion encoding ('+' encoding of spaces fails), and parses the JSON returned into individual responses, removing the <em> and </em> tags Access is via the static get(String) method which returns a singleton instance for the URL
    Since:
    1.28.0
    Author:
    S.Roughley knime@vernalis.com

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static RcsbUrlSuggester get(java.lang.String urlFormatString)
        Method to get an effectively singleton instance of the suggester for the given urlformat
        Parameters:
        urlFormatString - The format string for the URL - '%s' will be replaced with the text value from the dialog
        Returns:
        The Suggester for the URL. Instances are effective singletons

      • convertLineToSuggestions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> convertLineToSuggestions(java.lang.String line)
        Description copied from class: UrlTemplateSuggester
        Method to convert a single line from the response to suggesion(s)
        Overrides:
        convertLineToSuggestions in class UrlTemplateSuggester
        Parameters:
        line - The line from the URL response
        Returns:
        A list of suggestions which will be added to the overall suggestion list. The default simply wraps the line in a singleton list

      • preprocessQuery

        protected java.lang.String preprocessQuery(java.lang.String t)
                                    throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Description copied from class: UrlTemplateSuggester
        Method to pre-process the query prior to inserting into the URL template
        Overrides:
        preprocessQuery in class UrlTemplateSuggester
        Parameters:
        t - The string to base suggestions on
        Returns:
        The pre-processed string. The default calls URLEncoder.encode(String,String) with the encoding specifed by UrlTemplateSuggester.getDefaultQueryEncoding()
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - it the encoding was not recognised
